original_text: “And the seven for the four thousand, how many baskets full of broken pieces did you take up?” And they said to him, “Seven.”
korean_text: 또 일곱 개를 사천 명에게 떼어 줄 때에 조각 몇 광주리를 거두었더냐 이르되 일곱이니이다

sentences.original_text: And the seven for the four thousand,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 사천 명을 위한 일곱 개는,

sentences.original_text: how many baskets full of broken pieces did you take up?”
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 거둔 남은 조각으로 채운 광주리는 몇 개였느냐?”
